subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Two former Coke workers sentenced
Two former Coca-Cola employees were sentenced to serve prison terms for conspiring to steal and sell trade secrets to rival Pepsi Cola.

Stripping for college credit
A student writes her honors thesis about working at a strip club.  KETV's Carol Kloss reports.  (May 23)
